channel.title: Help with server advertisement
channel.description:
Hey guys i was wondering if anyone could help me with the server advertising... I posted my server on there a few days ago but everytime i click edit my server is says i dont have 1 listed :S So i was wondering if someone could explain to me how it works? like whats the username and password for that they have to check or whatever? PLEASE HELP I REALLY NEED THIS TO GAIN PLAYERS!!!
thanks -matt-

item.title: Help with server advertisement
item.dc:creator: @hydravision hydravision
item.description:
@hydravision wrote:

ohhh wow kewl Ok just to get my head screwed on properly my server MUST be running for 24 Hours before the status page goes on yes?

Other then that I know what to do now Thanks tons guys!!

Read full topic

item.title: Help with server advertisement
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

You create the username and password, then you login, log-off, then bam, you’re done.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with server advertisement
item.dc:creator: @hydravision hydravision
item.description:
@hydravision wrote:

durial12:

You just log into your server with that account information. It allows them to “log the account in” and see if your server is online.

So basically I log in-game with the username and password?.. But how long do i needa be logged in for? :S Cos that just confuses me if u gotta log in to your own server with weird users and passwords lol, or do u gotta create the account for them so they can login? or :S

Read full topic

item.title: Help with server advertisement
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

You just log into your server with that account information. It allows them to “log the account in” and see if your server is online.

item.title: Help with server advertisement
item.dc:creator: @hydravision hydravision
item.description:
@hydravision wrote:

DannyBoy1995:

Ohhhhhhhhhhh never mind!!! if your signed into your moparscape account it will send you to your registered server my bad!

AHAHAHAA!!! ok but still mopar give u a weird username and password and says to register on ur server or some crap :S i dont get it lol the users and pass’s are normally just weird letter and numbers all jumbled up so yer im not sure whats with that

Read full topic

item.title: Help with server advertisement
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

hydravision:

Ohhhk so my server needs to keep running for 24 hours? Alright thats sweet cos i think the passed few times my servers gone down LOL and im still confused about the Username and password they give you? :S Could u please explain a little more??

Ohhhhhhhhhhh never mind!!! if your signed into your moparscape account it will send you to your registered server my bad!
